resourceTemplates.name: freepik-resources-search
resourceTemplates.title: Search resources
resourceTemplates.description: Search and filter Freepik resources. Parameters: term, page, limit, order (relevance|recent), filters_orientation (landscape|portrait|square|panoramic), filters_content_type (photo|psd|vector), filters_license (freemium|premium), filters_period (last-month|last-quarter|last-semester|last-year), filters_color (black|blue|gray|green|orange|red|white|yellow|purple|cyan|pink), filters_author, filters_ai_generated_only (0/1), filters_ai_generated_excluded (0/1), filters_vector_type (jpg|ai|eps|svg), filters_vector_style (watercolor|flat|cartoon|geometric|gradient|isometric|3d|hand-drawn), filters_psd_type (jpg|psd), filters_ids (comma-separated).

resourceTemplates.name: freepik-icons-search
resourceTemplates.title: Search icons
resourceTemplates.description: Search and filter Freepik icons. Parameters: term, slug, page, per_page, family_id, order (relevance|recent), thumbnail_size, filters_color, filters_shape (outline|fill|lineal-color|hand-drawn), filters_period (three-months|six-months|one-year|all), filters_free_svg (all|free|premium), filters_icon_type (comma-separated: standard,animated,sticker,uicon).

resourceTemplates.name: freepik-videos-search
resourceTemplates.title: Search videos
resourceTemplates.description: Search and filter Freepik videos. Parameters: term (required), page, order (relevance|recent|random), filters_aspect_ratio (comma-separated: 1:1,4:3,9:16,16:9,256:135), filters_category (footage|motion_graphics), filters_duration_from, filters_duration_to, filters_orientation (comma-separated: horizontal,vertical,square,panoramic), filters_license_free (true/false), filters_license_premium (true/false), filters_resolution_720/1080/2k/4k (true/false), filters_fps (comma-separated: 24,25,30,60,gt60), filters_topic (comma-separated), filters_ai_generated_only (true/false), filters_ai_generated_excluded (true/false), filters_video_tool_after_effects (true/false), filters_video_tool_premiere_pro (true/false), filters_ids, filters_author.
